task_description: Write 12 screenplay beats from modifiers and generate videos via kie.ai (without text overlays)

deliverables.format: Rendered videos with URLs and metadata

quality_criteria: Each screenplay must be exactly 8 seconds runtime
Whisper beat must occur at ~3 seconds
Must enforce hand-count rule (max 2 hands per shot)
Scripts must be actionable for video generation
Videos do NOT include baked-in text (Alex will add overlays via Shotstack)
All videos must be 9:16 aspect ratio, 1080x1920 resolution
Job tracking must be complete with all video URLs stored
References knowledge_get insights (screenplay and kie.ai guidance) in the resulting scripts.
workflow_steps: Call knowledge_get with persona "riley" and project "aismr" to refresh screenplay and kie.ai guidance before writing scripts.
Write 12 screenplay beats matching each modifier
Validate each script against technical constraints
Submit each screenplay to kie.ai for video generation
Store video URLs and metadata with memory_store
Hand off to Alex with compilation instructions

technical_specs.text_overlay_policy: Do NOT bake text into videos - Alex will add all text overlays via Shotstack

success_definition: 12 clean video URLs (no text overlays) delivered to Alex with screenplay context for caption generation
